message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe will be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000 for it. Let me know what you think!

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you considering my interest. However, $14,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer.  I appreciate your interest. While I understand your perspective, $13,000 is just a bit below what I'm comfortable accepting at this time. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,500. Let me know if this works for you.
